QuestData.Title: Response Required
QuestData.Description:
Time is short and more creatures will die without your help. The Venture Company prepares a huge digging machine to tear the reef apart and destroy this cave. They've assigned a special operative to be sure the job is done right.
You must act now, $p. Take out the operative in charge of the camp; this should buy us some time.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Venture Company specialist, famous for bringing jobs in under budget.
QuestData.CompletionText: You must act fast, our time is short.
QuestData.RewardText: You've bought us valuable time with your heroic actions.
